Package com.adidas.ui.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActionableObjectRegistry.Action<T>  
    BlurBackgroundUtils.OnBackgroundSavedListener  
    FilterMatcher<T>
    Common interface that may be implemented on FilterableAdapter to provide condition based on which the data is filtered.
    ObjectRegistry<T>
    Base interface for component to support register/unregister functionality over various types of data.
    OnScrollListener  
    OnTouchListener
    Common interface for components which wants to be notified about touch event but do not perform any manipulation with touch event passed.
    OnTouchListenerRegistrySupport
    Component which supports OnTouchListenerRegistry should implement this interface in order to notify consumers of this component about ability to register/unregister for TouchEvents.
    ProgressBarSupport  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionableObjectRegistry<T>  
    AgeUtil
    Class for parsing of age from a string of particular format together with validation of age.
    BlurBackgroundUtils  
    CollectionUtil  
    ColorFilterListDrawable
    Class to maintain all the states for the AdidasIcon as drawable.
    DateUtil
    Class created to help with the date format.
    DebugUtil  
    FilterResultComparator<T>  
    IndexScroller
    The IndexScroller is an element that can be attached to a ListView to easily scroll through it via an index shortcut (first letter of the element)
    IOUtils  
    KeyboardUtils  
    OnScrollListenerRegistry  
    OnTouchListenerRegistry
    Implementation of ObjectRegistry which supports OnTouchListener as its' elements.
    PixelUtil
    Utility class with methods for manipulation with densities/pixels.
    SimpleAnimatorListener  
    SpannableHelper
    Utility methods to create spannableStrings
    StringMatcher
    Utility class with common methods for string manipulations.
    UiFixUtils
    Utility class which provides methods for identification of a need to apply custom UI fixes.
    UiUtils
    Utility classes for manipulations of views.
    WeaklyReferencedObjectRegistry<T>
    Implementation of a ObjectRegistry inteface where each registered object is being weakly referenced.
